title: Countries with the highest proportion of soccer players 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
The Proportion of soccer players is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country The Netherlands.
The highest Country Germany has 9.4 more Proportion of soccer players than the lowest Country The Netherlands.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Proportion of soccer players in each Country on the y axis.
The Proportion of soccer players is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country The Netherlands.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
The Proportion of soccer players is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country The Netherlands.
The highest Country Germany has 9.4 more Proportion of soccer players than the lowest Country The Netherlands.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Proportion of soccer players for 5 number of Countrys.
The Proportion of soccer players is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country The Netherlands.
There is a difference of 9.4 between the maximum Country Germany and minimum Country The Netherlands.
Country Germany is higher than any other Countrys with value 19.8, followed by Chile, and Paraguay. Down to Country The Netherlands with the lowest value 10.4.
The Country Germany tends to be 1.37 percent higher than average.
The Proportion of soccer players is 72.1 if we add up values of all Countrys.
